descriptionHtml:
Note: In advance, this is a rather non-serious mod.

Ever had a time where you feel like going shirtless, being a manly Dovahkiin, but you simply can\'t do it without the fear of being beaten to a pulp? Fear no more! Wear Manly Trousers, a simple yet entertaining modification of the Ragged Trousers, turning them into Heavy or Light Armor! Manly Trousers is a quick remake of the Vanilla Ragged Trousers, taking them from a simple clothing item at zero armor protection into a starting protection of twenty five or fifteen armor rating with the ability to create and enhance them at smithing craftbenches under a Heavy and Light Armor class.

-----------------------

Before:

Original Ragged Trousers - 
0 Armor Rating 
(No Armor Classification)

After:

Manly Trousers Heavy - 
25 Starting Armor Rating 
(Heavy)

Manly Trousers Light - 
15 Starting Armor Rating 
(Light)

-----------------------

Installation -

Download and drop the \'Manly Trousers\' into your Data folder!

-----------------------

How to Craft:

Heavy - 2 Leather Strips, 5 Leather (Misc Category), Tempering - Corundum Ingot
Light - 2 Leather Strips, 5 Leather (Misc Category), Tempering - Leather

-----------------------

Again, please know in advance that this is not a 100% serious mod, it is for those who may want to find fun in running around shirtless while still pertaining armor rating. If you don\'t like it, you don\'t have to download it.

Let me know what you think, of if there could be room for improvement!
author: MetroidGuy95
